transArray.content: The hotel equipment is very new and smart, and the lights are voice-activated. When ordering takeaway, there will be a small robot delivered to the door, which is very convenient. In the lobby, you can play billiards and catch dolls, and there are working tables. There are washing machines and dryers on the first floor, laundry detergent, laundry baskets and disinfectant, full marks for details. My personal check-in experience is very good, mainly because I feel very convenient and comfortable.
